Package org.apache.struts2.interceptor

Class StrutsResourceIsolationPolicy

java.lang.Object
org.apache.struts2.interceptor.StrutsResourceIsolationPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceIsolationPolicy
public final class StrutsResourceIsolationPolicy extends Object implements ResourceIsolationPolicy
Default resource isolation policy used in FetchMetadataInterceptor that implements the ResourceIsolationPolicy interface. This default policy is based on https://web.dev/fetch-metadata/.
See Also:
  • https://web.dev/fetch-metadata/
  • https://www.w3.org/TR/fetch-metadata/
